# Customer List

Role Permission: ViewCustomersMenu = 4

  • Customer (Name)
  • Short Name
  • Parent
  • Type
  • City
  • State
  • Zip
  • Billing Contact
  • Email
  • Active

Paginated, filtered, searchable

# Update

# Queries

​from company in ctx.ObjectContext.vwCustomerLists
orderby company.Name
select company;
